channel.title: running on Satish S
channel.description: Recent content in running on Satish S

item.title: May 2 Run
item.description: Day - 10 A slower recovery run. Humid again, when the sweaty tshirt is sticking to the HR monitor HR is high by 4-5 beats.

item.title: May 1 Run
item.description: Day - 9 A slower recovery run. Good Start for the month.

item.title: April 30 Run
item.description: Day - 8 A slower recovery run compared to day 7.

item.title: April 29 Run
item.description: Day - 7 A slow recovery run. Slighlty cooler weather and the pace was faster by 25secs.

item.title: April 28 Run
item.description: Day - 6 1st Km warm up. Next 12 km run in the MAF Heart Range 139bpm - 149bpm.

item.title: April 27 Run
item.description: Day - 5: Rest Day No run today. Legs have recovered 90%.

item.title: April 26 Run
item.description: Day - 4: Rest Day No run today. Legs are a bit tired.

item.title: April 25 Run
item.description: Day - 3 1st Km warm up. Next 12 km run in the MAF Heart Range 139bpm - 149bpm.

item.title: April 24 Run
item.description: Day - 2 1st Km warm up. Next 12 km run in the MAF Heart Range 139bpm - 149bpm.

item.title: April 23 Run
item.description: Day - 1 A slow recovery run. Aim was to keep the heart rate under < 140bpm.

item.title: Running Journey
item.description: Starting a journey to get fit, and faster. As part of the journey i will be using the blog to record my every runs, how my body and mind felt.
